v3:
* Update to version 11.10.0-release.0
* Added option to enable/disable media download
* Added option to restore scroll position when returning to timeline
* Added option to stop auto-loading tweets
* Added option to show media tab on home screen
* Added option to hide XChat tab from sidebar
* Added option to lock bookmarks
* Added option to clear cache files
* Added option to change font style (normal, bold, italic...)
* Added option to open Plus settings via long press on floating button
* Added option to disable message reactions
* Added option to disable store updates
* Added option to change profile background color
* Added option to change media icons color when posting
* Added option to change reactions background color
* New settings interface design
* New styles for the add-ons and features section
* New options design
* Increased image quality to 100%
* 4K video support
* Network restrictions bypass
* Fixed opening links via external browser option
* Fixed main interface customization option
* Fixed navigation tabs show/hide control
* Bug fixes and improvements
